p: In the antioxidant study by DPPH scavenging method, M. peguensis crude extract displayed a dose-dependent radical scavenging activity in compared to standard. MEMP exhibited potent scavenging activity (88.71%) while BHT value was (92.15%) at 500 μg/mL. Besides, the IC 50 values of BHT and MEMP were 20.07, 15.96 μg/mL respectively and calculated by the linear regression equation, summarized in Fig. 2 and Fig. 3 .
